In order to have this bug addressed by the correct team please change the 
component field of this bug from Doc to Help.

Thanks!
AC

Hi,

Same problem occurs on my machine. I'm running linux-gtk(2.4.x) on amd64. In
addition to the exception in the original report, I get an error dialog when
clicking the Help preferences:
"Could not accept changes - The currently displayed page contains invalid values". 
After activating another prefs page, then re-activating the help prefs, the page
appears, "The selection determines..." but no controls are available on the
page. Both 'mozilla' and 'firefox' are available as browsers on my system.

In .log I found:

Geert
This is a problem with embedded browser.  Assigning to SWT.

There are 2 different problems reported here.

The WinXP problem has been resolved. Please upgrade to last week's integration 
build (bug 82657).

For the AMD64 problem: I've opened a separate PR bug 84673 and CC'ed Geert.



*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 82657 ***
